mapper.update:
update contract_information
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contract_type = #{contractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_name = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
party_a = #{partyA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
party_b = #{partyB,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
party_c = #{partyC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_range = #{contractRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_term = #{contractTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
signing_time = #{signingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contrscy_money = #{contrscyMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve = #{approve,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
opinion = #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update contract_information set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contract_type = #{contractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_name = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_a = #{partyA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_b = #{partyB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_c = #{partyC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_range = #{contractRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_term = #{contractTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signing_time = #{signingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contrscy_money = #{contrscyMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve = #{approve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, opinion = #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from contract_information where project_id=#{projectId} and del_flag=0
select * from contract_information where del_flag=0 and id in (select contract_id from contract_tender_relation where del_flag=0 and tender_id=#{tenderId})

select a.*,project_store.project_name from (select contract_information.*,tender_information.tender_document_name from contract_information,tender_information,contract_tender_relation where contract_information.id=contract_tender_relation.contract_id and tender_information.id=contract_tender_relation.tender_id and contract_information.del_flag=0 )as a LEFT JOIN project_store on project_store.id=a.project_id ORDER BY approve

select distinct ci.*,ps.project_name, CASE modal.state WHEN 0 THEN 0 WHEN 1 THEN 1 WHEN 2 THEN 2 ELSE 3 END as state from contract_information ci,project_store ps,modal where ps.del_flag=0 and ps.id=ci.project_id and constru_unit_id=#{unitId} and ci.approve=1 and ci.del_flag=0 and ci.id in (select contract_id from construction_progress where progress='100%' and approve=1) and modal.contract_id=ci.id and modal.del_flag=0
